title: Pixel 4 Ringtone and Alarm sound is not working.
content: i have bought pixel 4 just 2 months ago. Last 10 days the ringtone, alarm sound is not working. also the keypad sound is noisy. all the system sounds are not working.sometimes it works but the bottom speaker is very noisy and the sound coming from bottom speaker is low. while playing YouTube videos, the bottom speaker is extremely noise. anyone else facing the issue? can anyone give a solution please?
